org.jsapar.error

Class ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsapar.error.RecordingErrorEventListener
      • org.jsapar.error.ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ErrorEventListener

    public class ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener
extends RecordingErrorEventListener
    This error event listener records errors until it reaches a maximum number. Any errors that occurs after maximum number has been reached will cause a MaxErrorsExceededException instead. Created by stejon0 on 2016-10-15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener(int maxNumberOfErrors)
      Creates an error event listener where the error list needs to be fetched with RecordingErrorEventListener.getErrors() afterwards.
      ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener(int maxNumberOfErrors, List<JSaParException> errors)
      Creates an error event listener that adds errors to the supplied list

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorEvent(ErrorEvent event)
      Called when there is an error while parsing input or composing output.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener

        public ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener(int maxNumberOfErrors)
        Creates an error event listener where the error list needs to be fetched with RecordingErrorEventListener.getErrors() afterwards.
        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfErrors - The maximum number of errors allowed to be recorded

      • ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener

        public ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener(int maxNumberOfErrors,
                                            List<JSaParException> errors)
        Creates an error event listener that adds errors to the supplied list
        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfErrors - The maximum number of errors allowed to be recorded
        errors - The list that errors will be added to.

    • Method Detail

      • errorEvent

        public void errorEvent(ErrorEvent event)
        Called when there is an error while parsing input or composing output. This implementation saves the errors in a member list until maximum number has been reached. The list is protected by a semaphore/synchronized block in case more than one thread is writing to the same list. The list itself is used as the semaphore. Any errors that occurs after maximum number has been reached will cause a MaxErrorsExceededException to be thrown.
        Specified by:
        errorEvent in interface ErrorEventListener
        Overrides:
        errorEvent in class RecordingErrorEventListener
        Parameters:
        event - The event that contains the error information.
